participant_1.background:
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.
i just graduated from high school.
my mom is a cancer survivor.
My days are spent working, exercising, and trying to balance my work and family life.
i have a garden.

participant_2.background:
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday.
I like to wear comfortable, casual clothing when I'm watching TV or movies.
I am a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
I am not sure what ethnicity I am, but I'm proud of my heritage.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Pretty good! Couponing is going well, and my cat is doing great. Leroy is a good boy
Leroy Jenkins? That's a great name!
Thanks! I wanted to give him a name that would make people laugh
It definitely does. What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer
Oh, that's cool! I'm a recent high school graduate, still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
It's tough, but you'll find something you love
I hope so. I'm not really sure what I'm passionate about yet
Maybe you'll find it when you least expect it
Maybe. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch TV, do makeup tutorials, and coupon. I also like to go shopping
Sounds like you have a lot of fun!
I do! I like to keep busy
I'm glad! I'm trying to find more things to do for fun. I recently got into gardening, and I'm really enjoying it
That's great! Gardening is a lot of fun
Yeah, it is. I'm trying to grow my own vegetables, but it's a lot of work
It is, but it's worth it! I love fresh vegetables
Me too! I'm glad you're a couponer. I need to learn how to save money
It's not too hard! There are a lot of resources online that can help you get started
I'll have to check them out. Thanks for the tips!
No problem! I'm always happy to hel
